entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
